properties.name: judoscale.enabled
properties.description: Whether Judoscale metrics collection is enabled.

properties.name: judoscale.api-base-url
properties.description: The Judoscale API URL. Typically set via the JUDOSCALE_URL environment variable.

properties.name: judoscale.report-interval-seconds
properties.description: How often to report metrics to Judoscale, in seconds.

properties.name: judoscale.max-request-size-bytes
properties.description: Maximum request body size in bytes before ignoring queue time. Large requests can skew measurements.

properties.name: judoscale.ignore-large-requests
properties.description: Whether to ignore queue time measurements for requests larger than max-request-size-bytes.
